msbt.message: Guess what, ?Talking to you the other day convinced me to move here!I need to spend today unpacking, but I'd love to get together soon.
Did you come by to check in on me? You're so sweet, .I've relocated, but as you can see, I've got a lot of unpacking to doThanks for convincing me to make this change! I'm excited to be here.
Look who's here, checking in on me before I've even finished unpacking!As of today, I can start saying that I'm from too.So hello, new neighbor!
There you are, ! I took your advice and moved here.I hope you won't mind me leaning on you a bit while I get used to living on a new island.
Good to run into you again, now that I've moved to !Everyone I've met here is so nice! I think I've made the right move.Still, I hope you won't mind if I need to lean on you for a bit.
Hi again, !I took your advice and moved here. It's pretty exciting to be able to say I'm a resident of !Really looking forward to seeing more of each other on this island.

Hey, you! I wondered when I'd run into you again around here!I'm settling into my new home, but I might've never made this move at all if not for your good advice.Watch out, though I might still need your support now and then.

ACHOO! Ohâ€”hi, ! Don't come too closeI guess I caught a cold during my move here. Now probably isn't the b-best time for you to visit me When I'm over this, I do want to get together and compare notes on living.
Nice to run into you again so soon after my move, !I was convinced to relocate here by , .I hope you don't mind me leaning on you a bit while I'm settling in.
Surprised to see me? I live here now!I decided to move after listening to talk up the island.Now that I'm here, I hope we can make plans together soon!
, hi again!I was wondering when I might run into you around the island, now that I live here with you, .I moved here on the advice of my friend .Here's hoping we see a lot more of each otherneighbor.

I bet you didn't expect to run into me, walking around your islandGuess what, though?<10_4 /> I moved here to too!It was that talked me into it, .Seeing you again makes me sure this was the right move for me!

I'm sorry I haven't had a chance to say hello to you yet. If you hadn't heard, I'm living here now. It was who gave me the idea to move.When I heard that you were living here too Well, , that sealed the deal!

ACHOO! Hi, Sorry about that. Surprised to see me? I decided to move here after suggested it. If I wasn't sick with this cold Ah-CHOO! I'd suggest getting together to catch up. ACHOO! Let's try to do that soon, OK?

Did you know I moved here?Someone else from your island talked me into it, but just after I arrived, I found out they'd moved away. I hope that's just a coincidence. I'd started to wonder if I'd done the right thing, but here you are! I already feel better now that you've stopped by to see me. I'm so glad I have you nearby!

Oh wow!So glad to see a familiar face! I moved here after someone from your island talked me into itThen I found out they don't live here anymore, and I wasn't sure what to make of that news. It sets me at ease to see you here I hope we'll see lots of each other!

? ACHOO! Sorry I've got a cold.I knew someone here that used to make me tea when I was sick, but that friend moved away. I was feeling alone and stressed out since my friend left the island, and that was before I'd even gotten sick. ACHOO! Seeing your face again is kind of a relief, .I need to get well again so I can adjust to my new life on the island. Hope you can help me with that.
Did you hear that I was back? Now we can spend more time together!I still have a lot of unpacking to get done, but let's get together to chat once I've settled in, .
, remember me? I used to live hereWell, I decided to move back again! And being here has me remembering all those fun talks we once had , I'm glad to see you! Don't be a stranger, OK?

Oh, hi, !ACHOO! Sorry, got a cold. Anyway, remember me?I used to live here ?<10_4 /> That's right. ACHOO! I'm very glad to be back on , butâ€” ACHOO!I'm not feeling so great right now. Let's chat after I get better, OK?

, guess what?Your old friend lives here now too!OK, that sounded weird, talking about myself in the third personAnyway, I'm super excited that I'm going to be living here with you! Let's be the best of neighbors!
? Here?Oh, wait THAT'S where I'd heard of before. It's where you live!Well, now it's where I live too! We're going to be neighbors!
? Hi! It's me, !I wonder if you still remember me? I heard that you lived here too I'm so glad I finally ran into you! Now that we live on the same island, let's get to know each other better!
? How are you? It's me, !I decided to make the leap and move to !I'd heard you lived here, so it's funny we haven't run into each other yet. I'm glad we're both here now!
Ahhh CHOO! ? That is you, right?It's me, ! I moved here to !Sorry we met again while I'm sick Once I'm feeling better, we should get together, . AAAAA-CHOO! Sorry again.
Hello, ! Starting today, I'll be living here. If you remember, I'm .I was feeling a bit nervous, but knowing you're here makes me feel much better about it all.
Hello, ! My name's . Do you happen to remember me, by any chance?In case you haven't heard, I'm living here now. I truly hope we can get to know each other better!
Ah ACHOO! Oh, pardon me! It's you, right? ? It's me, .I'm living on now. Oh, but I have a bit of a cold, I'm afraid.Once I'm feeling better, let's plan on having a nice chat!
!I'm so glad we met on that island. And that I'm all moved in here now.I've still got lots of unpacking to do, but I'm really looking forward to spending time together here!
Did you come by to check in on me? You're so sweet, .I've relocated, but as you can see, I've got a lot of unpacking to doThanks for convincing me to make this change! I'm excited to be here.
Look who's here, checking in on me before I've even finished unpacking!As of today, I can start saying that I'm from too.So hello, new neighbor!
!I'm really glad we met on that other island, and I'm excited that we both live here now! This should be fun.

, hi!I was inspired to move here after the last time we ran into each other.The other islanders I've met so far have been great to me, so I feel like I'm in the right place, . It's good to know you'll be nearby.
We meet again, !I'm still new here on this island, so it's great to see a friendly face.
Hey, !I've been wondering when I'd run into you again since I moved here!I might never have done that if you hadn't made me feel so welcome on your island, .So, thank youneighbor!

ACHOO! !I live here now! I guess you probably figured that out, .Sorry, I'm all stuffed up, and I'm not thinking clearly. You m-might want to k-keep away, so you don't catch this. When I'm better, let's get together and talk about .
Guess what, ?Talking to you the other day convinced me to move here!I need to spend today unpacking, but I'd love to get together soon.
Did you come by to check in on me? You're so sweet, .I've relocated, but as you can see, I've got a lot of unpacking to doThanks for convincing me to make this change! I'm excited to be here.
Look who's here, checking in on me before I've even finished unpacking!As of today, I can start saying that I'm from too.So hello, new neighbor!
! Remember me from the campsite?Well, you inspired me to move here, to this island! Hope we can see a lot more of each other now, neighbor.
Hi again, !Since we met at the campsite, I decided to follow you here to ! I really like everyone that I've met on the island so far, but I'm glad that you're around, .
I'm so glad we met at the campsite, , and happy we're both here now. Starting out in a new place is easier with friends around, .
I've been wondering when I'd see you here, !Our chat back at the campsite was what motivated me to move to this island and join you, . I'm so excited to be your neighbor!

ACHOO! Hi, .I made good on my decision back at the campsite to come here, but right after I arrived, I caught a cold. I moved here to b-be where you are, so I hate having to w-warn you away while I'm sick like this, . As s-soon as I'm over this, I hope we can get together and c-compare notes on .
Nice to run into you again so soon after my move, !The other day at the campsite, suggested I move here. And here I am! I hope you won't mind if I lean on you while I settle in, .
Surprised, ?I got talked into moving here by while I was staying at the campsite.Now that we're neighbors, here's hoping we see a lot more of each other, !

Hi again, !I wondered when I'd run into you around the island now that we're both living here, .I was on a camping trip here when gave me the idea to move in. Looks like we might be seeing a lot more of each other nowneighbor.
I bet you didn't expect to run into me here on your islandI was talked into moving here by while I was staying at the campsite. Seeing you again makes me even more glad I moved, !

I'm sorry I haven't had a chance to talk to you yet. If you hadn't heard, I'm living here now. When I visited the campsite, encouraged me to just move in. Knowing you're here toowell, that's like a bonus, !

ACHOO! Hi, Surprised to see me?I got talked into moving here by while I was staying at the campsite. If I wasn't sick with this cold Ah-CHOO! I'd suggest getting together to catch up. ACHOO! Let's try to do that as soon as I'm well again, .

Had you heard that I moved here?Someone from your island talked me into it while I was camping here, but they moved away in the meantime. After that, I started wondering if I'd made the right decision. I feel better now that you've stopped by. I can't wait to catch up with you, now that we're neighbors, !

Oh wow? Great to see you!While I was camping here, one of the locals urged me to just go ahead and move in. I took their suggestionWhen I found out they'd moved away in the meantime, I wasn't sure what to make of that news, . I feel better knowing you're here I hope we'll see lots of each other!

? ACHOO! Sorry I've got a cold.While I was on the island camping, a local told me I should move here. But they've moved away since then.Living in a new place is stressful. I wouldn't be surprised if that left me open to getting sick ACHOO! Seeing your face again is a relief, though, .When I'm over this, I hope we can get together for real and talk more.

Thanks for coming to see me so soon after my move, !And thanks again for inviting me to relocate here, back at the campsite. I moved in just as soon as I could! I should be settled in by tomorrow. Let's get together then or whenever is good for you, .

! So sweet of you to check in on me.I'm glad you encouraged me to go ahead and move in while I was here staying at the campsite. I still have some unpacking to do, but I should be done by tomorrow. Let's catch up then, !

! Please forgive this messI just got back to the island, and I still have some unpacking to do.I moved in as soon as I could, after you suggested it at the campsite. That was a great idea, ! Now that I'm here, I hope we can see a lot more of each otherneighbor.
Good to see you, !Thanks for making me feel welcome while I was staying at the campsite. It meant a lot to me when you said I should move here, .You inspired me to become an actual resident of !

!I've been wondering when I might run into you since I moved in here.I wanted to thank you again for inspiring me to become a resident while I was here at the campsite. That was the best decision I've ever made! I'm so glad to be your neighbor, .

Hey there, !How have we not run into each other again before now, ?I can't thank you enough for giving me the motivation to move here, while I was staying at the campsite. I can't believe we're neighbors now!

Wow, !I don't think I've seen you since my camping trip here, .It's been so long, maybe you don't even remember suggesting that I move here to .Still, I want to thank you for your good advice! I love living here, and I'm really glad we're neighbors now.

Oh my gosh, ! I haven'tâ€” ACHOO!Sorry, it's this cold. I haven't seen you since you encouraged me to move to the island, . Well, I took your suggestionâ€” ACHOO! Sorry. We should try to catch up once I get over this.

Thanks for the neighborly visit, !Everyone here made me feel welcome while I was staying at the campsite.I think that's why I fell in love with this place on my trip, .And why I immediately jumped on 's idea to move in!Well, I still have stuff to unpack but I really appreciate you stopping by. We should definitely catch up soon!

Look who it isâ€”! I'm your newest neighbor.Everyone was so kind to me while I was here on my camping trip.All it took to get me to move in was suggesting it!Speaking of moving, I still have a lot that I need to get unpacked here.But we can catch up anytime, now that I live here, !

Hey there, !Do you remember me from when I was staying at the campsite?That camping trip made me a huge fan of So it was easy for to convince me to move.I'm so excited that you and I are neighbors now, !

Nice to see you, !Did you know I live here now?Everyone was so nice to me while I was here visiting the campsite, especially That's who said I should just go ahead and move here. I'm so glad I took the suggestion, !

Wow, !I don't think I've seen you since I visited the campsite, .It was on that camping trip that I fell in love with this island and all of you who live here. So it wasn't hard to get talked into moving here by .I'm really glad we ran into each other like this! Let's try to make it a habit.

Well, hey there, !Don't think I've seen you since I was camping on the island, butâ€” ACHOO!Sorry I moved here after that trip. That was 's idea!It's too bad we finally ran into each other again while I'm sickWe should catch up once I can fight off this cold. ACHOO!

Did you know I was moving here, ?Another resident talked me into it while I was staying at the campsiteBut Resident Services tells me they've moved away since.I wasn't sure how to feel about that, but I feel better knowing you're here.

Oh, !I'm so glad to see a familiar face.When I was staying at the campsite, a resident insisted that I move here. Then I found out they moved away. I was feeling kind of weird about that, but running into you like this really cheers me up, !

! ACHOO!Sorry for that. I've got a cold.Funny story: when I was visiting the campsite here, someone from your island talked me into moving inWhen I did I found out they didn't live here anymore, and then on top of that I got sick, . ACHOO! Seeing you now makes me feel like my luck might be improving.
